name: Hentai Students: Love Puzzle
description:
In a popular Institute for girls, an epoch-making event -a guy was taken to study!
Try on the role of your dreams and cause a stir in woman's society.


Game features:

Five full CG animated girls.
Each has its own appearance, character and history. Get to know each one better and seduce them!


Nice gameplay.
“This is the game my mother used to play in her office!” you exclaimed, and you were right. Yes, this is the bubble shooter! 20 levels of popular mini-game that will allow you to fall in love with the game beauties.


Gifts.
Give your new friends beautiful gifts!
More than 30 items are waiting to be in girls hands.


Funny music.
8 music tracks from different artists will create the right mood during the game.


a Lot of text.
Talk to each girl and find out her personal story. Over 7000 words in dialogs!
...That you click through. :(
